author: veithen
msg: Added a new Maven plugin that creates Axis2 repositories based on project dependencies (of type aar and mar). Purpose:
* Get rid of some obscure maven-antrun-plugin, maven-dependency-plugin and maven-assembly-plugin stuff.
* Make sure that modules properly declare their dependencies (instead of copying stuff from the target folder of another module).
Used that plugin to fix the metadata module (which didn't declare its dependency on addressing.mar).

author: sf
msg: Reduce logging noise at graceful restart

author: stefan2
msg: Introduce a private file handle cache API and provide an implementation.
(svn_file_cache_t, svn_file_cache__handle_t): introduce new opaque data types
(cache_entry_t, entry_link_t, entry_list_t): define new internal data structures
(svn_file_cache_t, svn_file_cache__handle_t): define data types used in the API
